June 2007 {{Cite news

 | idÃ©rig, original forsker url = http://furesoe.lokalavisen.dk/en-id%C3%A9rig,-originial-
 | forsker/20070702/artikler/707020330/ language = Danish publisher = FuresÃ¸Avis
 | date = 2007-07-03 pages = 15
}} ) was an English-Danish physicist, and neuroscientist, who was educated
at University College London (B.Sc., 1st), Yale (M.S.) and Cambridge University
(Ph.D.). He spent most of his career as a professor at the Technical University
of Denmark, Denmark, (1967-) after having spent five years as a researcher at
the Argonne National Laboratory.
categories: Fellows of the Institute of Physics
